message.raw:
Gazebo currently only supports skeleton animations, so it depends on how your vehicle is animated. I'd recommend you look into creating your vehicle out of links and joints.

This sounds more like a question than a bug report or feature request, so it would be more appropriate for http://answers.gazebosim.org/ than this issue tracker. I'll close this. See you at Gazebo Answers!
message.html:
Gazebo currently only supports skeleton animations, so it depends on how your vehicle is animated. I'd recommend you look into creating your vehicle out of links and joints.

This sounds more like a question than a bug report or feature request, so it would be more appropriate for http://answers.gazebosim.org/ than this issue tracker. I'll close this. See you at Gazebo Answers!
